Name: In the Wild
About the game: In the Wild is an educational game where you control animals, explore environments, complete tasks, and play mini-games.           Educational Learn interesting facts about every animal you can control! Our in-game guide will teach you different facts about each animal as you use them. Collect each fact you discover in your book for future reference. Collect all facts and earn a trophy for that animal! Entertaining Take control of each animal and run around, play games, complete quests, and unlock items! With tons of animal-specific mini-games, there's always something to do around the world. Explore and find new islands with new animals, containing unique content with each location. Day and Night, Rain and Snow Our dynamic time and weather system enables an additional layer of interaction with the world. The time of day and weather determines the available mini-games, quests, and unlockables. As a player, you can choose to use real-world time (relative to their time-zone) or a customizable in-game time. You also have the ability to enable and disable different weather types. How you play is completely up to you.
